title: book_The_Ruby_Ring
text:
ISBN-13: 9781400051731.
ISBN-10: 1400051738.
Title: The Ruby Ring.
Subtitle: A Novel.
Authors: Diane Haeger.
Categories: Fiction.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=uupUDwAAQBAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Seeking refuge in a convent following the untimely death of her lover, master painter Raphael, a penniless Margherita Luti is forced to surrender her ruby engagement ring, a gift from the artist, to a representative of the Pope, in a sensuous historical novel, set during the Italian Renaissance, that chronicles the passionate love affair between the artist and his muse. Reader's Guide included. Original. 25,000 first printing..
Published Year: 2005.
Average Rating: 3.69.
Number of Pages: 371.
Ratings Count: 1050.
